Package com.java.controller.map

Class MapValidator

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.java.controller.map.MapValidator
  • public class MapValidator
extends java.lang.Object
    MapValidator handles the map validation part of the game. It can validate either a .map file or a user created map on console.
    Version:
    1.0.0
    Author:
    Arnav Bhardwaj, Karan Dhingra, Ghalia Elkerdi, Sahil Singh Sodhi, Cristian Rodriguez
